projectRoot.description: The root directory of the project to lint

fix.description: Fix as many issues as possible

quiet.description: Disable reporting on warnings, only errors are reported

maxWarnings.description: Specify a warning threshold, which can be used to force exit with an error status if there are too many warning-level rule violations
